allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2 Complete: Model Loading Infrastructure

Added complete model loading system for DiT360, VAE, and T5-XXL.

Features:
- DiT360Model architecture wrapper with FLUX.1-dev config
- VAE encoder/decoder with 8x scaling support
- T5-XXL text encoder integration
- HuggingFace Hub auto-download
- Smart path resolution (filename/relative/absolute)
- Multi-precision support (fp32/fp16/bf16/fp8)
- Device management (GPU/CPU offloading)
- Graceful error handling

Updated Nodes:
- DiT360Loader: Now loads actual models
- DiT360TextEncode: Real text preprocessing

Files Added:
- dit360/model.py (384 lines)
- dit360/vae.py (315 lines)
- dit360/conditioning.py (375 lines)
- tests/validate_structure.py
- PHASE2_COMPLETE.md

Stats:
- 3,092 total lines of code
- All validations passing
- 20% project complete (2/10 phases)
EOF
)")
